unnormalised: ## EdTech Buzz: Need a Scholarship? There's a Portal for That, Yaar!
normalised: ## EdTech Buzz: Need a Scholarship? There is a Portal for That, Yaar!

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch of those skyrocketing tuition fees? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to be your knight in shining armour! Forget scouring newspapers and college notice boards like it's the 90s, everything is online now. Think of these portals as your personal matchmaking service, but instead of finding *the one*, you're finding *the funds*!

Imagine bagging that Rs. 50,000 scholarship – pizza party, anyone?

unnormalised: Many portals even offer resources to ace those pesky scholarship essays and interviews. Plus, they often list deadlines (pro tip: applications for some close on 26/01/2024!), so no more last-minute panic at 11:59 pm! Check them out – registration usually takes just a few minutes at 03:00 pm and could land you the scholarship of your dreams. The future is here and it's bringing scholarships to your fingertips! Just make sure to double-check eligibility criteria before you dive in. Good luck for your applications due by 14/11/2023!
